pr_title: Fixing broken PA for Node to Node Encyrption clusters

timeline.message: Commenting the trusted-cas-file-path variable in properties file

timeline.bodyText: While debugging we had to change the config file at 2 places. While it might be possible that same config file is kept at 2 places, but something we can check before merging.
timeline.author: aditjind
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -25,7 +25,7 @@ https-enabled = false
 # Setup the correct path for server certificates
 certificate-file-path = specify_path
 private-key-file-path = specify_path
-trusted-cas-file-path = specify_path
+#trusted-cas-file-path = specify_path

replies.bodyText: Right, so we copy this file to the 2 locations.
replies.author: khushbr

replies.bodyText: Right, so the same file gets copied at the 2 locations.
replies.author: khushbr
